title: Mercypeaking-Based Science Photography Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Applied photography training in science fields for professionals. Requires building practice-oriented learning environments using low-cost solutions within limited budgets

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain how to film scientific experiments using macrophotography techniques
Learners can create and analyze visual records of scientific phenomena using low-cost digital equipment
Learners can present the process of scientific discovery in project report format based on photographed materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
